General.Name: Rich Honour International Designs Co Ltd
General.Description: Rich Honour International Designs Co., Ltd. operates as an interior designing company in China, the United States, Europe, the Middle East, and Asia Pacific. It offers branding services; research and development services, such as strategy, technology, coordination, master planning, operation, and project management planning services; and design services, including feasibility studies, programming, space planning, decoration, color and material, project management, design supervision, and design bible. The company also provides technology services comprises of IRS, IT, accessories, M.E.P., shop drawings, technical integration, technical management, and cost estimation services; production services; construction services; and project management services, including interiors, PCM, and consultant services. It serves hotel and restaurant, commercial and retail, workplace, and civic and public industries. Rich Honour International Designs Co., Ltd. was founded in 1977 and is based in Taipei, Taiwan.
General.Address: No. 75, Nanjing East Road, Taipei, Taiwan
